data.message: Hate it !!!! And I don't want to here is the way to provide a faster and more reliable experience.  I don't care.  I want to be able to answer my messages and have an easier way to delete messages as well. By using ONE app only.

replies.message: Hi, Elizabeth. With Messenger, we're able to provide a better overall experience, and linking between the two apps is fast and simple. -Rhea
I don't like.  I prefer using one app. It was already a good experience using it. Messenger should be an option for people to download and for those who don't like it can continue using one app.
